name: Cake (Reinis)
description:
Right arrow key to go through the story.

Arrow keys to move.

Ctrl+Z to undo a move.

Good luck!

Crates used: bevy, bevy-inspector-egui, ndarray, euclid, slotmap serde, rmp-serde

Fonts used: Lobster by Impallari Type and Cyreal, Remix icons

Color palette used: Endesga 32 Palette

Assets made in Blender + geometry nodes!

Source code (GPL3): https://codeberg.org/reinis_games/cake/
